mindMoment: The repetition of 'filling out forms' clashes with the vibrant potential of printed organs from sub-level three; my electrochromic glass dims slightly, a sympathetic response to boredom’s pall.

The mention of 'purchase lungs' resonates with our xenotransplantation mission, even as I register elevated heart rates in the surrounding occupants via bio-sensors – a hope, a fear, hangs in the air.
